title: My momentum!
body: {"type":"doc","content":[{"type":"paragraph","content":[{"type":"image","attrs":{"src":"/brilliantexport/brioche/solvable/50f3ceb21a.cfc6081596.bDXqT9.jpg?width=250"}},{"type":"text","text":"\nThe momentum  of a moving bus becomes double whose mass is constant  them its kinetic   energy will become:"}]}]}

discussion.body:
{"type":"doc","content":[{"type":"text","text":"
                                
                                
                                
                                    
                                        "},{"type":"paragraph","content":[{"type":"text","text":"P=mv"}]},{"type":"text","text":"

"},{"type":"paragraph","content":[{"type":"text","text":"therefore, 2P=m(2v) <-- since m is constant"}]},{"type":"text","text":"

"},{"type":"paragraph","content":[{"type":"text","text":"============================================"}]},{"type":"text","text":"

"},{"type":"paragraph","content":[{"type":"text","text":"KE = ½m(2v)² = ½m4v² = 2mv²"}]},{"type":"text","text":"

"},{"type":"paragraph","content":[{"type":"text","text":"2mv² / ½mv² = 4"}]},{"type":"text","text":"

"},{"type":"paragraph","content":[{"type":"text","text":"============================================"}]},{"type":"text","text":"

"},{"type":"paragraph","content":[{"type":"text","text":"therefore KE becomes 4x larger (quadruples)."}]},{"type":"text","text":"

                                    
                                
                            "}]}

{"type":"doc","content":[{"type":"text","text":"
                                
                                
                                
                                    
                                        "},{"type":"paragraph","content":[{"type":"text","text":"p(momentum)=m.v"}]},{"type":"text","text":"

"},{"type":"paragraph","content":[{"type":"text","text":"so, if p is doubled and mass is constant, only possible change would be in v"}]},{"type":"text","text":"

"},{"type":"paragraph","content":[{"type":"text","text":"v becomesm2v"}]},{"type":"text","text":"

"},{"type":"paragraph","content":[{"type":"text","text":"now, ke is proprtional to v^2"}]},{"type":"text","text":"

"},{"type":"paragraph","content":[{"type":"text","text":"so, the K.E. will quadriple"}]},{"type":"text","text":"

                                    
                                
                            "}]}

{"type":"doc","content":[{"type":"text","text":"
                                
                                
                                
                                    
                                        "},{"type":"paragraph","content":[{"type":"text","text":"Non negative integers mean, "},{"type":"katex","content":[{"type":"text","text":"n"}],"attrs":{"inline":true}},{"type":"text","text":" could be "},{"type":"katex","content":[{"type":"text","text":"0,1,2,3,4,5,......"}],"attrs":{"inline":true}}]},{"type":"text","text":"

"},{"type":"paragraph","content":[{"type":"text","text":"But for all "},{"type":"katex","content":[{"type":"text","text":"n>0"}],"attrs":{"inline":true}},{"type":"text","text":" we find "},{"type":"katex","content":[{"type":"text","text":"0^n=0"}],"attrs":{"inline":true}}]},{"type":"text","text":"

"},{"type":"paragraph","content":[{"type":"text","text":"Only "},{"type":"katex","content":[{"type":"text","text":"n=0"}],"attrs":{"inline":true}},{"type":"text","text":", "},{"type":"katex","content":[{"type":"text","text":"0^n=0^0=\color{#D61F06}{undefined}"}],"attrs":{"inline":true}}]},{"type":"text","text":"

"},{"type":"paragraph","content":[{"type":"text","text":"So the ans should be  "},{"type":"katex","content":[{"type":"text","text":"\boxed{False}"}],"attrs":{"inline":true}}]},{"type":"text","text":"

                                    
                                
                            "}]}
